required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Mechanisms, Predictors, and Social Determinants of Cardiotoxicity in Prostate Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Cardiotoxicity of Prostate Cancer Therapy: Mechanisms, Predictors, and Social Determinants of Health in Prostate Cancer Patients Treated With Androgen Deprivation Therapy

lead_sponsor.agency: Abramson Cancer Center of the University of Pennsylvania

clinical_study.source: Abramson Cancer Center of the University of Pennsylvania

brief_summary.textblock: This is an observational study for patients with prostate cancer that will be treated with Androgen Deprivation Therapy. The study will help the investigators learn more about how these medications affect the heart and how those effects relate to patients' medical history and social determinants of health (such as race, gender identity, education, occupation, access to health services and economic resources). Patients on this study will have echocardiograms, blood draws, and answer questions about their symptoms and activity level. Patients will be followed on this study for up to 5 years.

detailed_description.textblock: The investigators propose a prospective longitudinal cohort of prostate cancer patients treated with Androgen Deprivation Therapy (ADT) to determine the associations between social determinants of health (SDOH) and cardiotoxicity risk and to determine wither associations between SDOH and cardiotoxicity risk differs according to race. Patients will be followed with serial echo, blood draw, and surveys prior to start of ADT and then 6 months, 1 year, 2 years, 3 years, and 5 years after start of ADT.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Left Ventricular Ejection Fraction (LVEF)
primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion (expected to be 15 years)
primary_outcome.description: Absolute change in LVEF by echocardiogram at follow-up

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion (expected to be 15 years)
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence of CTRCD defined as at least a 10% absolute change in LVEF by echocardiogram at follow-up relative to baseline to a value < 50%

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion (expected to be 15 years)
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence of symptomatic heart failure (centrally adjudicated)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion (expected to be 15 years)
secondary_outcome.description: Change in longitudinal strain by echo from baseline

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion (expected to be 15 years)
secondary_outcome.description: Change in circumferential strain by echo from baseline

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion (expected to be 15 years)
secondary_outcome.description: Change in diastolic function defined as E/e' by echo from baseline

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion (expected to be 15 years)
secondary_outcome.description: Change in LV Mass by echo from baseline

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Relative LV Wall Thickness
secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion (expected to be 15 years)
secondary_outcome.description: Change in relative LV wall thickness from baseline

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion (expected to be 15 years)
secondary_outcome.description: Change in Ventricular-Arterial Coupling defined as Ea/Ees by echo from baseline

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion (expected to be 15 years)
secondary_outcome.description: Change in LV Twist measured by 3D echo from baseline

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion (expected to be 15 years)
secondary_outcome.description: Change in LV Torsion measured by 3D echo from baseline

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion (expected to be 15 years)
secondary_outcome.description: Change in NTproBNP measured in batches from banked samples from baseline.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion (expected to be 15 years)
secondary_outcome.description: Change in hs-TnT measured in batches from banked samples from baseline.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion (expected to be 15 years)
secondary_outcome.description: Change in Patient Reported Outcomes Information System (PROMIS) Fatigue Score from baseline. A higher score corresponds to higher reported levels of fatigue.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in patient reported quality of life
secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion (expected to be 15 years)
secondary_outcome.description: Change in Patient Reported Outcomes Information System (PROMIS) Global Health score from baseline. Higher scores indicate a healthier patient.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in patient reported activity level
secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion (expected to be 15 years)
secondary_outcome.description: Change in total weekly leisure activity in METS assessed by Godin Leisure Time Exercise Questionnaire from baseline.

clinical_study.condition: Drug-Related Side Effects and Adverse Reactions

intervention.description: We will perform detailed phenotyping of Social Determinants of Health using the National Institute of Minority Health and Health Disparities PhenX SDOH toolkit at baseline.

biospec_descr.textblock: Plasma, Serum, and buffy coat will be banked.

study_pop.textblock: Patients will be recruited from the medical oncology practices at the Abramson Cancer Center.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
Men older than 18 years of age Prostate cancer diagnosis planned for treatment with â‰¥6 months of ADT (with or without RT) for clinically localized, biochemically recurrent, or oligometastatic disease. Planned ADT regimens may include: GnRH agonists (goserelin, histrelin, leuprolide, triptorelin) with or without first-generation anti-androgens and GnRH antagonists (degarelix). Additional systemic agents, including second-generation androgen receptor signaling inhibitors, may be used in combination with GnRH agonist/antagonist therapies per provider clinical discretion.
Ability to provide informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
Prior ADT injection within 6 months prior to enrollment Inability or unwillingness to provide consent

condition_browse.mesh_term: Drug-Related Side Effects and Adverse Reactions
